hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##the Lost Woods## has #5# major items.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: Don't believe in yourself. Believe in the me that believes in you!

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a spider high #above the icy waters# holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that inside the #lakeside lab# a person and a spider hold...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Piece of Heart#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #an Ocarina#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that ##Jabu Jabu's Belly## has #2# major items.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Minuet of Forest# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.
hinted_locations: LW Deku Scrub Near Deku Theater Right

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Bombs (5 pieces)# can be found in #Goron City#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Thieves' Hideout# is a foolish choice.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that a school of #stingers swallowed by Jabu Jabu# guard #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Fire Temple Small Key# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Game Key#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path of #time#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple GS Sun on Floor Room

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path to the #Fire Medallion#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Heavy Block Third Chest

KF (Storms Grotto).text: I wanna be a rocketship, @! Please help me live my dreams!

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Game Key# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Green Potion Bottle#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Bomb Flower Platform Chest

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Red Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #a Green Rupee# and #a Water Temple Small Key#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Ganon's trials# protect the way to #Twinrova#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a #fairy outside Ganon's Castle# holds #Deku Stick Capacity#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left).text: BRRING BRRING This is Ulrira. Wrong number?

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Huge Rupee#.
